mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_category_ref ac INNER JOIN article a ON ac.article_id = a.article_id WHERE ac.category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_view_count, a.article_comment_count, a.article_create_time, a.article_summary, a.article_user_id, a.article_is_reprint FROM article_category_ref ac INNER JOIN article a ON ac.article_id = a.article_id WHERE ac.category_id = #{categoryId} LIMIT #{begin},#{pageSize}
SELECT c.* FROM article_category_ref acr LEFT JOIN article a ON a.article_id = acr.article_id LEFT JOIN category c ON acr.category_id = c.category_id WHERE a.article_id = #{articleId};
